title: kots1980
author: kots1980
content: hello. i am trying to withdraw money from 1 win, but i cannotthey only reply with copy paste messages, and they say that i should keep trying.did i lost my money? is there anything i can do?

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: How are we supposed to help you with information if you can't even tell us what the URL of the website is?I searched and this three came up in the top results. So which one are you referring to?1. 1winbet.in2. 1win-bet.com3. 1win1.inMake a proper scam accusation using this format

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: Is this the casino you refer? ðŸ”¹1win.pro ðŸ”¹| iGaming Platform | Crypto&Fiat | Bonus +500% To the first deposit although they have an ANN thread and representative in this forum, but they're currently inactive. So you can't expect anything with them, the only way is contact them in any way e.g. telegram, twitter, reddit etc. That's would force them to take care of your complaints, as long as they're a trusted casino, they wouldn't scam you. IMO if the amount is small, it's better for you to forget with your money and just gamble with the money you have currently.

comments.author: spyrosc200
comments.body: Quote from: kots1980 on October 29, 2022, 09:48:37 PMhello. i am trying to withdraw money from 1 win, but i cannotthey only reply with copy paste messages, and they say that i should keep trying.did i lost my money? is there anything i can do?1win.com.ci, 1win.pro, 1win.xyz and many other variations are all the same.1win.xyz was on bitcointalk as well, scammed manyhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5385407.120Try Indian Consumer Complaints Forum, surprisingly many claim they had their cases solved.
